title: Amazing Half Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ['150g self-raising flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '150g margarine', '150g caster sugar', '3 large eggs', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', 'To decorate', '100g icing sugar', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '1-2 tablespoons hot water', '25g white chocolate', 'Extra equipment', '20cm (8 in) cake tin', 'greaseproof paper']
